description.narrative: Legal framework and capacities to detect, refer and respond to violence are developed and implemented with cross-sectoral coordination

sector.narrative: Alternative care reform and service provision
Child protection focused on care and support for children with disabilities
Legal and policy framework related to violence, exploitation and abuse
Violence, exploitation, and abuse - surveys (e.g. KAP, VACS), data analysis/research/evaluation evidence generation, synthesis, and use

description.narrative: Justice, Law and Order human rights affairs

title.narrative: UNICEF Programmes in North Macedonia (Child Protection)
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Legal framework and capacities to detect, refer and respond to violence are developed and implemented with cross-sectoral coordination

description.narrative: New research and data on violence against children provided an evidence base for revision of legislation. Professionals' capacity was developed for assisting child victims, strengthening cross-sectoral cooperation and ensuring the best interest, including respect and prevention of secondary victimisation, of all children in contact with the law. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:26/12/2019

title.narrative: Number of newly appointed ministers (Minister of Health, Minister of Labour and Social Policy, Minister of Justice, Minister of Education and Science, and Minister of Interior) who reaffirm the commitment to end violence against children
availability of a normative framework on outlining/defining functions (roles and responsibilities, work procedures/SOPs) for social service workers

Country has a national, multi-sectoral plan(s) or strategy(ies) for coordinated action to prevent and respond to violence against children that meets key criteria for quality, according to status of plan.
